channel.title: Making items sellable back to shop on project czar
channel.description:
How would i make it so someone can sell items BACK to the shop??
i tried going into shop.cfg and changing the 1st numbers from 1 to 2 then back to 1 but it didnt work so can some1 help.
DONT SAY GO INTO SHOP.CFG AND MAKE IT A 1 OR 2 I TRIED THIS ALREADY!!
